messages.title: Get involved
messages.content: With our country in a real crisis, and Cornwall sorely needing a strong voice at Westminster, now is the time to elect our next Lib Dem MP, Tim Styles.

keyPolicies.policyDescription: Tim and the Liberal Democrats would end the Brexit chaos that has engulfed our country and help build a strong and independent-minded Cornwall at the heart of a truly Great Britain.

issues.brexitEurope: Tim and the Liberal Democrats would end the Brexit chaos that has engulfed our country and help build a strong and independent-minded Cornwall at the heart of a truly Great Britain.

leaflet.personalStatement: Tim has spent his whole life serving the public. He joined the Royal Navy straight out of school, serving on aircraft carriers, HMS Hermes, HMS Bulwark and HMS Ark Royal. After his military service he joined the Police force, working in the Met and then Devon and Cornwall Police before putting himself through college to train as a lawyer.

examples: Tim has spent his whole life serving the public.
With our country in a real crisis, and Cornwall sorely needing a strong voice at Westminster, now is the time to elect our next Lib Dem MP, Tim Styles.
help build a strong and independent-minded Cornwall at the heart of a truly Great Britain.
Tim and the Liberal Democrats would end the Brexit chaos that has engulfed our country.

personalStories.story: Tim has spent his whole life serving the public. He joined the Royal Navy straight out of school, serving on aircraft carriers, HMS Hermes, HMS Bulwark and HMS Ark Royal. After his military service he joined the Police force, working in the Met and then Devon and Cornwall Police before putting himself through college to train as a lawyer.

examples: Tim and the Liberal Democrats would end the Brexit chaos that has engulfed our country.

After his military service he joined the Police force, working in the Met and then Devon and Cornwall Police before putting himself through college to train as a lawyer.
